attributes.action: Stop Googles Streetview from invading our privacy now.!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Google Streetview gives unlimited access to potential thieves, to case out individuals Homes
Farms and Businesses in the search of easy entry points, access to property, and suitable equipment to pinch to order, all aided and abetted by this company.
Google says it will consider removing certain items on request, may I ask how does a vulnerable elderly person without access to Googles “Streetview” view their property let alone email this intrusive company when they have neither access to a computer, or for that matter an email address.?
More over this site allows for vehicles of type, colour, and make to be sort out in order for a number plate to be cloned, with a simple visit to that road or premises that Google has unwittingly provided to the would be thieve, and fraudster.

This infringement of our privacy must stop right now..!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
